Package com.davidbracewell.reflection

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Specification  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeanDescriptor
    Contains basic information about the read and write methods for a class.
    BeanDescriptorCache
    A cache of BeanDescriptor to speed up performance of using BeanMaps.
    BeanMap
    A Map based interface for accessing the properties of a bean object.
    BeanUtils
    Methods for constructing beans and setting their parameters using value in the Config
    Reflect
    Reflect is a class that allows fluent use of reflection
    ReflectionUtils
    Static classes to make reflection easier.
    ValueType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ReflectionException  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Ignore
